info.name: 9Anime - Fullscreen player
info.description:
Style is only applied on the video page.
Since 9anime changes url alot (www2, www6, www8) might not work, just edit the style to include the domain.

Wanted to make the 9anime player take up the full window like netflix so I made this basic style.

Resizes everything so the player uses the full monitor height and width.
Now the video takes up the whole window.
